data.comment: The match is underway at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in for West Ham at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 2, Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal's Bukayo Saka has run offside.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 5, Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
West Ham drive upfield and Declan Rice gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to West Ham.
West Ham's Angelo Ogbonna is whistled for offside at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Ham's half?
In the minute 13, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Michail Antonio gets his shot on target but fails to score for West Ham.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In London Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is caught offside.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of West Ham.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
West Ham drive forward but Michail Antonio is judged offside.
In the minute 21, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Throw-in West Ham.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Michael Oliver blows against Arsenal's Bukayo Saka for offside.
In the minute 24, Free kick Arsenal.
Goal! A Alexandre Lacazette header gives Arsenal a 1-0 lead in London.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang with an assist there.
In the minute 27, Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for West Ham at Emirates Stadium.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 30, Arsenal's Bukayo Saka breaks free at Emirates Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Michael Oliver awards West Ham a goal kick.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Free kick for West Ham in the half of Arsenal.
Throw-in for West Ham close to the penalty box.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Throw-in West Ham.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
West Ham have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Ryan Fredericks (West Ham) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Michael Oliver signals a West Ham throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of West Ham.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Michail Antonio is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Ryan Fredericks.
The second half has started at Emirates Stadium.
Bukayo Saka (Arsenal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a Arsenal throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 49, Arsenal to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
West Ham's Arthur Masuaku misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Bukayo Saka of Arsenal is pulled up for offside.
West Ham's Michail Antonio gets in a shot on goal at Emirates Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of West Ham.
In the minute 59, West Ham have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Jarrod Bowen (West Ham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, West Ham have a goal kick.
Mikel Arteta is making the team's first substitution at Emirates Stadium with Nicolas Pepe replacing Willian.
Michail Antonio (West Ham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 65, Granit Xhaka is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
West Ham attack and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Tomas Soucek but the ball cannons into the bar!
West Ham drives forward and Jarrod Bowen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 67, Free kick West Ham.
Granit Xhaka is back on his feet again.
Jarrod Bowen (West Ham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 68, Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
West Ham's Jarrod Bowen gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
West Ham are coming forward and Tomas Soucek gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Alexandre Lacazette for Arsenal is whistled offside.
In the minute 76, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Arsenal.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
Mikel Arteta (Arsenal) is making a second substitution, with Edward Nketiah replacing Alexandre Lacazette.
In the minute 78, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Goal kick for West Ham at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 82, The away team have replaced Jarrod Bowen with Andriy Yarmolenko. This is the first substitution made today by David Moyes.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Edward Nketiah puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 85, Great play from Dani Ceballos to set up the goal.
Michael Oliver awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Sebastian Haller is replacing Pablo Fornals for West Ham at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 89, David Luiz is replacing Bukayo Saka for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in West Ham.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang for Arsenal drives towards goal at Emirates Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Michael Oliver will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal push forward at Emirates Stadium and Nicolas Pepe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Ham defence.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to West Ham's area.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
The away team replace Arthur Masuaku with Felipe Anderson.
